Package Controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CourseController
public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
The class has all the methods managing Course object and all objects related to

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CourseController()
    This is the constructors which load list of courses, indexes, lessonList and studRegCourses respectively.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String school, int au)
    This method takes in course code, course name , school and AU, and creates new course.
    void addLesson​(Lesson le)
    This method create lesson object and adds into lesson list.
    void changeIndex​(java.lang.String matric, int index, int newIndex, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in student's matric number, course code of the course, registered index number of the course, and new index number of the course and changes the registered index number to the new index number.
    java.lang.Boolean checkClash​(java.lang.String matric, int newIndex, int oldIndex)
    This method takes in the matric number of the student, new index number, and old index number and checks whether the timing of the lessons under the new index number clashed with the lessons under the student's registered indexes.
    java.lang.Boolean checkCompleteCourse​(java.lang.String matric, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in matric number, index number, and course code and checks whether the student has completed the course.
    boolean checkCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in course code and checks whether the course code exist in the course list.
    java.lang.Boolean checkCourseRegistered​(java.lang.String matric, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in matric number, index number, and course code and checks whether the student has registered for the course
    boolean checkIndex​(int index)
    This method takes in index and checks whether the index exists in the index list.
    boolean checkIndexInCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, int index)
    This method takes in course code ,and index and checks whether the index belongs to the course code.
    java.lang.Boolean checkTotalAU​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and checks whether the student exceed the maximum amount of AU for registration.
    int checkVacant​(int index)
    This method takes in index number and checks vacancy of the index number.
    void deregisterCourse​(Student student, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in student object, index number and course code, and de-registers student from the course.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Course> getAllCourses()
    This method load all the courses.
    java.util.ArrayList<Index> getIndexInCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in course code and return list of indexes that has the course code
    java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> getLessons​(int index)
    This method takes in index number and return list of lessons that has the index number.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Course> getRegisteredCourses​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and return list of courses that the student registered.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Course> getWaitlistCourses​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and return list of courses that the student is on wait list.
    void newIndex​(int newIndexNum, java.lang.String courseCode, int newVacancyInt)
    This method takes in new index number, course code and new vacancy number, and creates a new index under the course code.
    void registerCourse​(Student student, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in student object, index number and course code, and registers student to the course.
    void swopIndex​(java.lang.String ownMatric, java.lang.String peerMatric, int ownIndex, int newIndex)
    This method takes in student's matric number, peer's matric number, student's index number, and peer's index number and swaps peer's and students index.
    void updateCourseCode​(java.lang.String courseCodeOld, java.lang.String courseCodeNew)
    This method takes in old course code , and new course code and updates the old course code to new course code.
    void updateCourseSchool​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String newSchool)
    This method takes in course code and new school, and updates the school name of the course code to new school name.
    void updateIndex​(int newIndex, int oldIndex)
    This method takes in old index number and new index number, and updates the old index number to new index number.
    void updateVacancy​(int indexNum, int newVacancy)
    This method takes in index number and new vacancy, and updates the vacancy of the index number to new vacancy.

    • newIndex

      public void newIndex​(int newIndexNum, java.lang.String courseCode, int newVacancyInt)
      This method takes in new index number, course code and new vacancy number, and creates a new index under the course code.
      Parameters:
      newIndexNum - New index number to be added
      courseCode - Course code of course
      newVacancyInt - Vacancy number of new index number

      matric - Matriculation number of the student

      public java.lang.Boolean checkCompleteCourse​(java.lang.String matric, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)

      courseCode - Course code of a course
      Returns:

    • checkClash

      public java.lang.Boolean checkClash​(java.lang.String matric, int newIndex, int oldIndex)
      This method takes in the matric number of the student, new index number, and old index number and checks whether the timing of the lessons under the new index number clashed with the lessons under the student's registered indexes.
      Parameters:
      matric -
      newIndex - New index number of the course
      oldIndex - Old index number of the course that the student has registered. It can be set to 0 if it is not needed.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • changeIndex

      public void changeIndex​(java.lang.String matric, int index, int newIndex, java.lang.String courseCode)
      This method takes in student's matric number, course code of the course, registered index number of the course, and new index number of the course and changes the registered index number to the new index number.
      Parameters:
      matric - Matriculation number of the student
      index - Registered index number of the course
      newIndex - New index number of the course to be changed
      courseCode - Course code of the course

    • swopIndex

      public void swopIndex​(java.lang.String ownMatric, java.lang.String peerMatric, int ownIndex, int newIndex)
      This method takes in student's matric number, peer's matric number, student's index number, and peer's index number and swaps peer's and students index.
      Parameters:
      ownMatric - Matriculation number of the student
      peerMatric - Matriculation number of the peer
      ownIndex - Index number of the course that the student has already registered
      newIndex - Index number of the course that the peer has already registered
